output$parameterUI = renderUI(
  {
    probParamUI = div(
      h3(style='text-align:center', "Initial (prior) probabilities"),
      fluidRow(
        splitLayout(
          numericInput(
            'pr_dD',
            ('detectable D') ,
            value = paramArgDefaults['prev'],
            min = 0, max=1, step = 0.01),
          numericInput('pr_hD',
                       ('hidden D'),
                       value = paramArgDefaults['sens'],
                       min = 0, max=1, step = 0.01),
          numericInput('pr_iD',
                       ('imposter D'),
                       value = paramArgDefaults['spec'],
                       min = 0, max=1, step = 0.01),
          numericInput('pr_noD',  ### best to slave this one for now.
                       ('no D'),
                       value = paramArgDefaults['spec'],
                       min = 0, max=1, step = 0.01)
    )))

  ObservationUI = 
    textInput(
      "dataInputID",
      value = "1 1 1 1",
      label=HTML("Tests (1s and 2s, format like 1 2 1 2)"),
      )
